[[Version 2.4]]
* Primordial Bathysmal Vishap Hatchling was released.
* '''2022-01-14''': The HP Loss inflicted by the Cleansing Shower attack was reduced.
** Old Formula:<br /><math>\text{HP Loss} = ( 20 \% \times \text{Character Max HP} + 300 ) \times ( 1 - \frac{\text{Remaining Energy}}{10} )</math>
** New Formula:<br /><math>\text{HP Loss} = ( 14 \% \times \text{Character Max HP} + 200 ) \times ( 1 - \frac{\text{Remaining Energy}}{10} )</math>
